name: Excess Mana
description:
Excess Mana, is a game made during WonderJam 2020.

You play as a powerless mage who builded 4 elementals altars in an ancient temple to finally gain magic powers.

However, the intense mana flux coming from the altars lure  elementals slimes from around the land during the night, when mana is more scarce.

Will you be able to use your new powers to explore the uncharted lands during the day and make unpenetrable defenses for the night? How will you spend the precious runes that you found?

How long will you survive?

Controls:

WASD for movement

Left Click for attacking

Right Click for building and upgrading towers in the temple

1234 for changing the currently equipped element



Made By:

Nicolas Bisson

Alexander Kurth

Félix Gagné Cliche

Antony Ménard

Gabriel St-Laurent-Recoura
